scripts.test: docker run --rm -it -v`pwd`:/workdir ${npm_package_anchorCIImage} /bin/bash -c "anchor build -- --features local-testing && ls target/deploy/*.json | xargs -I % cp program.json % && anchor test -- --features local-testing"
scripts.pre-commit-install: wget -O pre-commit.pyz https://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit/releases/download/v2.16.0/pre-commit-2.16.0.pyz && python3 pre-commit.pyz install && python3 pre-commit.pyz install --hook-type commit-msg && rm pre-commit.pyz
scripts.deploy-local: yarn build && solana program deploy target/deploy/*.so --program-id program.json -u localhost
